info.name: IMDb – Fixed Navigation Bar
info.description: Just some small personal fixes that I prefer when browsing IMDb. What it does; Removes ads and other useless things.. Changes the navigation bar to a fixed position so it goes along with scrolling up and down the site! Please leave a rating if you liked the userstyle! =================== Your Feedback is Highly Appreciated! Be sure to check out my other userstyles! http://userstyles.org/users/92431
info.additionalInfo: YYYY-MM-DD 2012-03-09 – initial release 2012-11-16 – minor changes 2013-10-17 – imdb updated their design hence this update 2014-02-10 – fixed an issue with the videos not loading 2014-02-27 – removed even more ads 2014-06-18 – changed few things in the userstyle 2014-10-19 – cleaned up the style, still does the same thing 2016-04-13 – fixed pinned messages that navigation overlapped
